extensionDescription.message: Add clickable IMDb ratings to Plex Web with enterprise-grade performance and security

howToGetKey.message: How to get your API key (FREE):

step3.message: Enter your email and activate from email

feature1.message: Extension automatically adds IMDb button in Plex

feature2.message: Click the button ‚Üí opens IMDb page

troubleshoot1.message: Verify you're on a movie details page

errorInvalidFormat.message: Invalid API key format! Must be 8 hexadecimal characters (0-9, a-f)

errorPlaceholder.message: Please enter a real API key, not a placeholder

successSaved.message: API key saved successfully! Reload Plex to apply changes.

errorInvalidKey.message: API key is invalid or not working! Please check and try again.

errorTestInvalid.message: API key is invalid! Please check and try again.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the saved API key?

successDeleted.message: API key deleted! Enter a new one to continue.
